name: Dante (TinyCthulu)
description:
Dear Intern,
Welcome to your first day in Hell.
Below, you will find a mostly intact copy of your on-boarding materials as well as a company name tag and uniform. Try to keep up, and don't mind the blood.

As an unpaid intern, your responsibilities will primarily include: 1. Unclogging toilets
2. Repairing company equipment
3. Disposing of the remains of former employees
4. Fetching miscellaneous items for higher ranking staff
5. And any number of other, smaller tortures

Remember, if an employee is unable to complete their assigned tasks within the unreasonable time frame provided, said employee will be forcefully *RESET*. We hope you hate your stay, thank you for your un-cooperation. Sincerely, Upper Management Meet Dante, an unpaid intern in Hell, working his way to the top of the *incorporeal ladder*. No matter your sins or status in life, every soul in the underworld must start somewhere. And for Dante, that somewhere is the very bottom.

Work hard, work smart, work fast, but above all... try not to get RESET. Use WASD to Move Use Number Keys to Select items. Use Tab to Cycle items. Use Q to Drop and Swap items. Use E to Interact with items and objects.
